original_title: Sri Lankan Rupee depreciates against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated against the US Dollar (USD) today compared to yesterday's buying and selling rates of the Central Bank.
According to the Central Bank, today's buying rate of USD is Rs. 311.62 while the selling rate is Rs. 328.90.
The buying rate of the USD reached Rs. 307.36 yesterday while the selling rate was Rs. 325.52.
The Rupee has been appreciating against the USD and other major currencies since last week. (DSB)
